content:
# I successfully harvested 10 units of stone, and my inventory now contains:
# - Coal: 15
# - Stone: 10
# - Iron Ore: 20

# Now that I have the required amount of stone, I can attempt to craft the stone furnace again. 
# I will check if the stone furnace recipe is available before crafting.

if can_craft(Prototype.StoneFurnace):
    craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=1)  # Crafting one stone furnace.
else:
    print("Cannot craft stone furnace: recipe not available.")  # Handling the case where the recipe is not available.
